name: ZynAddSubFX Instrument File
summary: Learn about .XIZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You may save and store XIZ files in any location on your computer using ZynAddSubFX. However, they are typically located in an instrument folder, such as Bass, Brass, Drums, Guitar, Organ, Strings, and Synth. These instrument folders are located in the following location:
To choose an instrument to use in ZynAddSubFX, select Instrument → Open Instrument..., navigate to the location of the XIZ file, and select OK.
To choose an instrument from an instrument bank to use in ZynAddSubFX, select Instrument → Show Instrument Bank..., choose the bank from the dropdown menu, and click the instrument.
To add XIZ instruments to ZynAddSubFX, place the XIZ files in a folder and move the folder to the following location:
Then, select Instrument → Show Instrument Bank... in ZynAddSubFX, and click the Refresh bank list. The instruments in the bank should now be displayed in ZynAddSubFX.
NOTE: You may also import XIZ instrument files into LMMS, an open source digital audio workstation (DAW).
